OnModify SQL
Set.Sql:

WHERE WF_ID = @WF_ID_OLD AND APP_XMLNAME = @APP_XMLNAME_OLD AND APP_ITEMNAME = @APP_ITEMNAME_OLD

Set.Name: OnPageLoad SQL
Set.Sql: SELECT * FROM _EWA_WF_UNIT WHERE WF_UNIT_ID = @WF_UNIT_ID_OLD and wf_id=@wf_id

Set.Name: OnNew SQL
Set.Sql: INSERT INTO _EWA_WF_UNIT(WF_UNIT_ID, WF_ID, WF_UNIT_NAME, WF_UNIT_MEMO, WF_UNIT_TYPE, WF_UNIT_PARA0, WF_UNIT_PARA1, WF_UNIT_PARA2, WF_UNIT_PARA3, WF_UNIT_PARA4 , WF_UNIT_ACT_BEF,WF_UNIT_ACT_AFT) VALUES(@EWA.ID, @WF_ID, @WF_UNIT_NAME, @WF_UNIT_MEMO, @WF_UNIT_TYPE, @WF_UNIT_PARA0, @WF_UNIT_PARA1, @WF_UNIT_PARA2, @WF_UNIT_PARA3, @WF_UNIT_PARA4 , @WF_UNIT_ACT_BEF,@WF_UNIT_ACT_AFT)

Set.Name: OnModify SQL
AddAction1 SQL
Set.Sql: SELECT ADM_ID,ADM_NAME FROM ADM_USER WHERE SUP_ID=@G_SUP_ID AND @T='WF_ADM_ADM' UNION SELECT DEP_POS_ID,DEP_POS_NAME FROM V_ADM_R_DEPT_POST WHERE SUP_ID=@G_SUP_ID AND @T='WF_ADM_POST' UNION SELECT DEP_ID,DEP_NAME FROM ADM_DEPT WHERE SUP_ID=@G_SUP_ID AND @T='WF_ADM_DEPT' UNION SELECT -1,'启动者' WHERE @T='WF_ADM_START' ORDER BY ADM_NAME

Set.Name: OnPageLoad SQL
Set.Sql: SELECT * FROM _EWA_WF_UNIT WHERE WF_UNIT_ID = @WF_UNIT_ID AND WF_ID=@WF_ID AND WF_REF_ID=@REF_ID

Set.Name: OnNew SQL
Set.Sql: INSERT INTO _EWA_WF_UNIT(WF_UNIT_ID, WF_ID, WF_UNIT_NAME, WF_UNIT_MEMO, WF_UNIT_TYPE, WF_UNIT_PARA0, WF_UNIT_PARA1, WF_UNIT_PARA2, WF_UNIT_PARA3, WF_UNIT_PARA4 , WF_UNIT_ACT_BEF,WF_UNIT_ACT_AFT,WF_UNIT_SELF_DEPT) VALUES(@EWA.ID, @WF_ID, @WF_UNIT_NAME, @WF_UNIT_MEMO, @WF_UNIT_TYPE, @WF_UNIT_PARA0, @WF_UNIT_PARA1, @WF_UNIT_PARA2, @WF_UNIT_PARA3, @WF_UNIT_PARA4 , @WF_UNIT_ACT_BEF,@WF_UNIT_ACT_AFT,@WF_UNIT_SELF_DEPT)

Set.Name: OnModify SQL
Set.Sql: UPDATE _EWA_WF_UNIT SET WF_UNIT_NAME = @WF_UNIT_NAME, WF_UNIT_MEMO = @WF_UNIT_MEMO, WF_UNIT_TYPE = @WF_UNIT_TYPE, WF_UNIT_PARA0 = @WF_UNIT_PARA0, WF_UNIT_PARA1 = @WF_UNIT_PARA1, WF_UNIT_PARA2 = @WF_UNIT_PARA2, WF_UNIT_PARA3 = @WF_UNIT_PARA3, WF_UNIT_PARA4 = @WF_UNIT_PARA4, WF_UNIT_ADM=@WF_UNIT_ADM, WF_UNIT_ADM_LST=@WF_UNIT_ADM_LST, WF_UNIT_ACT_BEF=@WF_UNIT_ACT_BEF, WF_UNIT_SELF_DEPT=@WF_UNIT_SELF_DEPT, WF_UNIT_ACT_AFT= @WF_UNIT_ACT_AFT WHERE WF_UNIT_ID=@WF_UNIT_ID AND WF_ID=@WF_ID AND WF_REF_ID=@REF_ID

Set.Name: AddAction1 SQL
Set.Sql: SELECT ADM_LID, ADM_ID,ADM_NAME +' ('+DEP_NAME+')' ADM_NAME FROM [~db]..ADM_USER A INNER JOIN [~DB]..ADM_DEPT B ON A.ADM_DEP_ID=B.DEP_ID WHERE A.SUP_ID IN (SELECT SUP_ID FROM [~db]..SUP_MAIN WHERE SUP_UNID=@REF_ID) AND @T='WF_ADM_ADM' AND A.PID IS NULL AND A.ADM_USR_STA_TAG='OK' UNION SELECT '', DEP_POS_ID,DEP_POS_NAME +' ('+DEP_NAME+')' FROM [~db]..V_ADM_R_DEPT_POST WHERE SUP_ID IN (SELECT SUP_ID FROM [~db]..SUP_MAIN WHERE SUP_UNID=@REF_ID) AND @T='WF_ADM_POST' UNION SELECT '', DEP_ID,DEP_NAME FROM [~db]..ADM_DEPT WHERE SUP_ID IN (SELECT SUP_ID FROM [~db]..SUP_MAIN WHERE SUP_UNID=@REF_ID) AND @T='WF_ADM_DEPT' UNION SELECT '', -1,'启动者' WHERE @T='WF_ADM_START' ORDER BY ADM_NAME

Set.Name: Upadte Adms
Set.Sql:
DELETE FROM _EWA_WF_UNIT_ADM WHERE WF_UNIT_ID=@WF_UNIT_ID AND WF_ID=@WF_ID AND WF_REF_ID=@REF_ID;
INSERT INTO _EWA_WF_UNIT_ADM( WF_UNIT_ID, WF_ID, WF_REF_ID, WF_UNIT_ADM, WF_UNIT_ADM_ID) SELECT @WF_UNIT_ID, @WF_ID, @REF_ID, @WF_UNIT_ADM, COL FROM F_SPLIT(@WF_UNIT_ADM_LST,',')
SELECT WF_TAG, WF_TAG_NAME, WF_TAG_GRP FROM _EWA_WF_TAG WHERE WF_TAG_GRP='WF_ADM' ORDER BY WF_TAG_ORD
SELECT WF_FUC_ID, WF_FUC_NAME FROM _EWA_WF_FUNC WHERE WF_ID=@WF_ID AND WF_FUC_TAG='WF_ACT_BEF' ORDER BY WF_FUC_NAME
SELECT WF_FUC_ID, WF_FUC_NAME FROM _EWA_WF_FUNC WHERE WF_ID=@WF_ID AND WF_FUC_TAG='WF_ACT_aft' ORDER BY WF_FUC_NAME

Set.Name: OnPageLoad SQL
Set.Sql:
select a.WF_ID,a.APP_FRAME_XMLNAME,a.APP_FRAME_ITEMNAME,a.APP_XMLNAME,a.APP_ITEMNAME, c.WF_NAME,d.WF_UNIT_ID,d.WF_UNIT_NAME,b.XITEMS from _EWA_WF_APP a inner join _EWA_WF c on a.WF_ID=c.WF_ID inner join _EWA_WF_UNIT d on c.WF_ID=d.WF_ID and d.WF_REF_ID=@REF_ID left join _EWA_WF_SHOW b on a.APP_FRAME_ITEMNAME=b.APP_FRAME_ITEMNAME and a.APP_FRAME_XMLNAME=b.APP_FRAME_XMLNAME AND B.WF_UNIT_ID=D.WF_UNIT_ID and b.wf_ref_id=d.wf_ref_id where a.WF_ID=@WF_ID
order by d.WF_UNIT_y

Set.Name: OnFrameDelete SQL
Set.Sql: IF EXISTS(SELECT * FROM _EWA_WF_SHOW WHERE APP_FRAME_XMLNAME=@APP_FRAME_XMLNAME AND APP_FRAME_ITEMNAME=@APP_FRAME_ITEMNAME AND WF_ID=@WF_ID AND WF_REF_ID=@REF_ID AND WF_UNIT_ID=@WF_UNIT_ID) BEGIN UPDATE _EWA_WF_SHOW SET XITEMS = @XITMES WHERE APP_FRAME_XMLNAME=@APP_FRAME_XMLNAME AND APP_FRAME_ITEMNAME=@APP_FRAME_ITEMNAME AND WF_ID=@WF_ID AND WF_REF_ID=@REF_ID AND WF_UNIT_ID=@WF_UNIT_ID END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO _EWA_WF_SHOW(APP_FRAME_XMLNAME, APP_FRAME_ITEMNAME, WF_ID, WF_REF_ID, WF_UNIT_ID, XITEMS) VALUES(@APP_FRAME_XMLNAME, @APP_FRAME_ITEMNAME, @WF_ID, @REF_ID, @WF_UNIT_ID, @XITMES) END

Set.Name: ExtendAction0 SQL
ExtendAction1 SQL
Set.Sql: select * from ( SELECT ADM_ID,ADM_NAME +' ('+DEP_NAME+')' ADM_NAME, 'WF_ADM_ADM' TAG FROM ADM_USER A INNER JOIN ADM_DEPT B ON A.ADM_DEP_ID=B.DEP_ID WHERE A.SUP_ID=@REF_ID AND ADM_ID IN (@ADMS_SPLIT) UNION SELECT DEP_POS_ID,DEP_POS_NAME +' ('+DEP_NAME+')','WF_ADM_POST' FROM V_ADM_R_DEPT_POST WHERE SUP_ID=@REF_ID AND DEP_POS_ID IN (@POS_SPLIT) UNION SELECT DEP_ID,DEP_NAME ,'WF_ADM_DEPT' FROM ADM_DEPT WHERE SUP_ID=@REF_ID AND DEP_ID IN (@DEP_SPLIT) UNION SELECT -1,'启动者','WF_ADM_START' ) aaa where 1=1

Set.Name: OnModify SQL
Set.Sql:
UPDATE _EWA_WF_UNIT_LOGIC SET WF_LG_VAL = @WF_LG_VAL, WF_UNIT_TO = @WF_UNIT_TO, WF_LG_EXP=@WF_LG_EXP
WHERE WF_LG_ID = @WF_LG_ID

Set.Sql: SELECT C.WF_UNIT_ID A, C.WF_UNIT_NAME+' ('+C.WF_UNIT_ID+')' B FROM _EWA_WF_UNIT A INNER JOIN _EWA_WF_CNN B ON B.WF_UNIT_FROM=A.WF_UNIT_ID AND A.WF_ID=B.WF_ID and a.wf_ref_id=B.wf_ref_id INNER JOIN _EWA_WF_UNIT C ON B.WF_UNIT_TO=C.WF_UNIT_ID AND C.WF_ID=B.WF_ID and a.wf_ref_id=C.wf_ref_id WHERE A.WF_ID=@WF_ID and A.WF_UNIT_ID = @WF_UNIT_ID and a.wf_ref_id=@ref_id

Set.Name: AddAction1 SQL
Set.Sql: -- write your sql
SELECT WF_ID, WF_NAME+'('+WF_ID+')' WF_NAME FROM _EWA_WF ORDER BY WF_NAME
SELECT WF_TAG, WF_TAG_NAME FROM _EWA_WF_TAG WHERE wf_tag_grp='WF_ACT' ORDER BY WF_TAG_ORD
